lines.text: Looks like somebody seems to feel threatened.
The only thing remotely threatening is your hairdo.
Synapses, we hardly hardly knew you!
Are they peeking at the answers?

[whispers]
We're going to easy on them!

[after the player does not make an answer]
I know, I know! It's
Please... don't shout out the answer, it may wake up the contestants.
